about_the_game:
Chinese fishing has exquisite pictures, rich fish species, and tries to create a real natural environment as much as possible. The goal of players is to enjoy the nature in the scenery and catch bigger and more fish.
On the screen:

Fish behavior is influenced by temperature, weather, plants, seasons, and human activities on shore.
E.g. There is a food processing plant on the shore, so the river next to it must be full of fish.

· Fishing patterns are affected by the seasons
E.g. Some lakes in the north freeze in winter, so you can only choose ice fishing.

The fishing environment will change with the seasons, and the methods of obtaining bait will also change.

· Buildings and scenery with regional characteristics

· This is a multiplayer online fishing game where you can chat with players and compete.

· Have a wide variety of fishing gear

Transportation vehicles: A variety of boats and cars, so that players can quickly get to the fishing spot.

· Beautiful water systems with different styles, different fishing environments and different types of fish.

· The habits of the same fish species will vary from environment to environment.

name: Chinese fishing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1135G7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R)Iris(R) Xe Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1135G7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R)Iris(R) Xe Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: "China Fishing " has exquisite pictures, with a wealth of fish species, as far as possible to create a real natural environment, the goal of players is to enjoy the scenery, catch bigger and more fish.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
